title: Madlyinks
author: Madlyinks
created_time: August 11, 2023, 10:31:38 PMLast edit: August 11, 2023, 11:59:37 PM by Madlyinks
content: What do you guys think of ApexOne AI? They claim to use quantum computing to conduct trades on several crypto exchanges and predict market trends with AI and Terabytes of Data.They seem very legitimate to me.Checkout their marketing materials on their YouTube page HERE

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: There is no path to wealth than knowledge.You can learn how to trade, but just trade with the amount of money that you can afford to lose. Trading should not be taken as a means to earn income. Some people can use it to earn but in the process of trying, most traders lost and continue to lose money.AI or other dependence from those people are just a way for the people to earn money from you if money is requested from you, avoid.

comments.author: Madlyinks
comments.body: I don't believe this I believe wealth can come easily to anyone who desires it.And I believe In the team behind ApexOneAII don't have a problem with them because they take their modest fee from my profits and I still make an impressive return.Considering ApexOne AI can produce a stable return of around 1.2% daily I'm happy with their performance. They are 35% more efficient than your standard trading bot.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: If they really have quantum computer to compute terabytes of data then they mist be able to process it in few seconds. Or i should say in milli seconds. But if what they are saying is true only then otherwise i think they might be bluffing because I must have heard about some platform havin quantum computer to compute the data to make useful patterns out of past data so we could increase the chances of winning the trades. I might be wrong but let's hear from those have have some experience on this platform. Usage of AI is not a new thing but I don't think they have the full availability of Quantum computer instead they are just familiar with sum techniques which they might apply to increase some speed otherwise i think the same as before.

comments.author: Madlyinks
comments.body: They utilize smart stop losses and you only have to be right 50% of the time to be profitable day trading heck you can be right less than half the time and be profitable.It's all about stop loss to take profit ratio.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: So your aim was to just make a post here with your referral link? Â Are you aware that referral link spam is against the official forum rules?I have just looked through your post history, and you have no other intentions here except spam about your so-called Quantum computing and AI

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Quantum computers are the size of rooms and really expensive to build and maintan because it involves constant cooling due to how complex the calculations that it does which isn't really easy because they solve calculations that would probably take millions of years but would do it much quicker so if a trading company says that they have quantum computer for their trading, do not believe them, there's not a lot of places that have quantum computers, it's existence is even secret to many so why do they have one. Definitely a fishy company if you ask me.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: The way I read your responses here, looks like you don't need any pointers from the community. Why not try it instead and see the result for yourselves? Seems you are interested in the first place and no one can stop you from doing that. You are telling us already the key components of that bot making me think that you already did some research about it (not unless just flooding a link intentionally).Just keep in mind that, regardless of the technology or algorithm used by these trading bots, a prediction will always be a prediction.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Madlyinks on August 11, 2023, 10:31:38 PMWhat do you guys think of ApexOne AI? They claim to use quantum computing to conduct trades on several crypto exchanges and predict market trends with AI and Terabytes of Data.They seem very legitimate to me.Checkout their marketing materials on their YouTube page HEREIt looks legitimate to you because you're the one who opened it up. But honestly, this "quantum" wording that's being attached to projects is being used like buzz words these days.Most investors don't really care if it's all about quantum computing, AI or what. As long as they just see the words even without furtherly knowing if they're for real or what, it doesn't matter.Get to try it if you're legitimately not connected to them and let us know your experience.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: If they are that much capable, why are they trying to get people to use their platform? Why use people's money to do their trading? I have visited their website. All they talk about is farming. Why should we give access to our assets to them? Does not that make the whole thing fishy? If they have the power and resources to predict good outcomes, why share with us? Because they are charging us secretly. And by staking our assets in their platform, we are giving access to our assets. That way, they can use that asset to benefit on their own. Their loss is your loss, but their profits are not your profits. You will always receive the same amount that they will give you. While you have the chance to do it on your own and keep all the profits to yourself, why let others do it? There are many CEX and DEX available for trading. Do it on your own and make the profits yours. If you lose, take that as a lesson and move forward. Use less money at the start. Use what you can afford to lose. There aren't any better options than doing it on your own. Don't trust any centralized shit.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: quantum computers are horrendously expensive and manufactured for specific tasks, and even with them they do not always achieve supremacy over a traditional supercomputer. Usually, when they manage to achieve it, with a specific task, the media is buzzing about it for several days. So imagine what a mess that is - a no-name company have access to quantum computing and AI to sell trading advices XD what a joke.Quote from: Madlyinks on August 11, 2023, 11:07:46 PMI don't believe this I believe wealth can come easily to anyone who desires it.By promoting scam all around?

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: The website looks very well made, but the contents are probably AI generated and even the pictures. Upon searching a couple of the names on the team, no one even pops up. I don't think it's something worth pursuing. If they are old as they say they are, why is it just now that they show their product etc?

comments.author: Synchronice
comments.body: Quote from: Madlyinks on August 11, 2023, 10:31:38 PMWhat do you guys think of ApexOne AI? They claim to use quantum computing to conduct trades on several crypto exchanges and predict market trends with AI and Terabytes of Data.They seem very legitimate to me.Checkout their marketing materials on their YouTube page HEREI googled their CEO Mike Liten and found nothing about him. He is not on LinkedIn too and to be honest, their video looks like a gig bought on Fiverr. Also, they have APEX coin and its website is for sale. This website is an investment platform that lets you deposit money and as they say, then they trade with their AI on different exchanges to bring you profit.This is definitely a scam project and they use the word AI to make themselves appear cool and forward-thinking, it's definitely a lure, they have no quantum computer and no superficial AI trading bot. And it's based in London. I can say that most ponzi/scam companies are based in London, idk why but somehow it's very easy to do that in London. At the same time, London is known for many people as a financial center, this gives a false sense of positive expectations. Please don't invest your money on this website!

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: The OP is more than obviously the owner of that site or part of the team behind the project, as it is quite clearly visible from his posts. All those promises that everyone can make a quick and easy profit only if they use AI are actually just completely false illusions that sooner or later break into pieces. As things stand, soon we will all become rich literally doing nothing, of course all thanks to AI and quantum computers - maybe today is the time to ask AI what the winning lottery numbers are and buy myself a tropical island for retirement days

comments.author: Bitcoin_people
comments.body: One thing to keep in mind when trading crypto is to start trading with the amount of money you can afford to lose. And if you are taking trading as your main source of income then it will be a completely wrong decision. But there are many people who want to use AI along with various social media to start a new business and gain profit. When starting trade with such AI it is seen that his money is lost so by using such video or AI, one can never start trading, but starting trade with own experience and knowledge can be profitable in future. If you trade with AI then it depends on others but if you learn about trading and then trade then you will be successful.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: Madlyinks on August 11, 2023, 11:07:46 PMConsidering ApexOne AI can produce a stable return of around 1.2% daily I'm happy with their performance. They are 35% more efficient than your standard trading bot.If a crypto platform guarantees you return then it is safe to assume they are nothing but a scam. So don't waste your time to convince others about how great the platform is.FYI, Quantum computing is still in the concept stage and many tech companies like google are trying to develop it but it may take another few decades to know whether it is possible in real so this proves the platform you are talking is lying so its an obvious scam.

comments.author: darewaller
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on August 17, 2023, 07:27:50 AMQuote from: Madlyinks on August 11, 2023, 11:07:46 PMConsidering ApexOne AI can produce a stable return of around 1.2% daily I'm happy with their performance. They are 35% more efficient than your standard trading bot.If a crypto platform guarantees you return then it is safe to assume they are nothing but a scam. So don't waste your time to convince others about how great the platform is.FYI, Quantum computing is still in the concept stage and many tech companies like google are trying to develop it but it may take another few decades to know whether it is possible in real so this proves the platform you are talking is lying so its an obvious scam.I heard that this Quantum Computing is so powerful that it can make Bitcoin and other cryptos less secure and it is seems not a new thing anymore but up until now, it is not clear if a finished product is already available. Maybe the platform here is only using that name to look innovative.AI on the other hand is very legit and it is now being used up anywhere. Yet in terms of trading, I agree with what others have said that anyone even the experts, can't have a guaranteed income with it. If we are talking about staking, lending and the likes, then it is possible and a small return ( APY/APR ) is usually the one that is realistic or not a scam.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: darewaller on August 17, 2023, 05:45:50 PMI heard that this Quantum Computing is so powerful that it can make Bitcoin and other cryptos less secure and it is seems not a new thing anymore but up until now, it is not clear if a finished product is already available. Maybe the platform here is only using that name to look innovative.Possibly never, and for the record IBM is still in the experimental stage of building Qubit processor so if a random site claims they have perfect one then its obvious scam which is conclusive enough to make our statements right.
